content: STI ETF CPF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 10 Nov 2018My current main investment mode is monthly investment plan in STI ETF. Topping up CPF SA seems likes an attractive option at 4% p.a. and tax relief. Is there ever a possibility of losing CPF money?3 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent
Gabriel LeeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 10 Nov 2018It's safe as it's backed by the Singapore Government which has one of the strongest credit rating.0 comments0
Daniel LingLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 10 Nov 2018If you lose CPF money. Your investments probably gone already.0 comments0
Yixiong ChangLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 10 Nov 2018The risk of loss in the market would be significantly higher than the probability of loss in CPF money =D. 0 comments0
